message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this unique product.  Given its value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,500,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to make a more reasonable investment. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and my budget.
